risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Asymptomatic infections persist, leading to undetected clusters of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain signal calibration for covid-19 marker in wbe monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of intercommunity
